Megaman Battle Network Legacy Vision Burst

Welcome to the Megaman Battle Network Legacy Vision Burst! This is a showcase of the canceled fangame used to display the unused sprites, maps, and soundtrack! You will be able to walk around the maps and interact with different characters as you would have in the games! There is no battling, but there are 20+ maps to explore!

Controls:
Arrow Keys: Move
Z: Interact
X: Run
Enter: Open Menu
A: Speak to Spyman for insight on current map
S: Jack In/Jack Out
1: Toggle Window Size
Notes:
- Mobile now supported! (Only portrait mode)
- You are able to Save/Continue if you choose to ever want to pause and come back!
- There are several clipping bugs in the game, nothing should be breaking though
- The audio may take some time to load when entering an area for the first time, but after its loaded, returning to the area should have it start immediately!

Your browser doesn't support HTML5 canvas.
